main_configuration.response_timeout_seconds_desc: stop waiting for a response after x seconds
main_configuration.delete_output_files_on_exit_desc: delete all output files in 'output/' upon exiting

model_configuration.default_model_desc: set the default model on startup and model switching. leave blank to use the first model alpha-numerically.
model_configuration.system_prompt_desc: define the default system prompt. leave blank to disable system prompts.
model_configuration.system_prompt: You are a helpful ASSISTANT. You will provide a response to USER in the current conversation.
model_configuration.stable_diffusion_model_desc: set the default stable diffusion model (must be a valid model if you want to use stable diffusion)
model_configuration.stable_diffusion_image_size_desc: set the resolution for stable diffusion images

behavioural_configuration.enable_functions_desc: enable functions - disable to strictly use chat functionality
behavioural_configuration.enable_internet_desc: enable internet access for functions, and to browse websites inside files
behavioural_configuration.enable_chat_history_consideration_desc: toggle using chat history as part of the prompt
behavioural_configuration.max_sources_per_search_desc: max number of sources to use, when using online sources
behavioural_configuration.max_sentences_per_source_desc: max number of sentences to use from each unique source
